alert.note: Alert for Fisher; Nolan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nolan and southeastern Fisher Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 743 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sweetwater. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Lake Sweetwater, Camp Boothe Oaks and Busby. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 239 and 260. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
